intents.name: Send Payment Reminder
intents.description: Sends email reminders to users about overdue payments.
examples: Send a reminder for overdue invoice 123.
Email a payment reminder to the client.
Send a thankyou mail or message for paid clients
Send a message or mails to clients

name: Reminder Sender
scope: Sends payment reminders via email to a group of users for overdue invoices.
